96b5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bru dAHbcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dung byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / 
96b6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs
96b7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar smod pa gal te sems mi zhum mi 'god la mi smag mi dang zhing dang bar mi'
96b8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ce
97a1(khri brgyad): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang na bral bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis/ 
97a2(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang
97a3(khri brgyad): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba
97a4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
97a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin pa
97a6(khri brgyad): bral ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa po co brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yangang
97a7(khri brgyad): pa'i mtha' rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par/ 
97a8(khri brgyad): shes pa'i rang bzhin nga lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin di lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu gzugs
97b1(khri brgyad): bzhin ni denges pa med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' bar gyi rang bzhin ni
97b2(khri brgyad): med pa ste/ tshe dang dran pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'dis gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang ba'i na dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa
97b3(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' bar ni yang dag pa' mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi ma
97b4(khri brgyad): dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' bar ni yang dag pa'i ma
97b5(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa
97b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
97b7(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
97b8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ring bu 'di ltar chos thams cad pa skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i 'u sma ye/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par byung 'dzi
98a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la smra ba dang nges pa'i 'byung ba mi dmigs sa// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
98a2(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba me dmig pa so// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha
98a3(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni blan
98a4(khri brgyad): lang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar yin no// de ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur ba de ste de ltar lus yongs su dag padang ngag yongs su
98a5(khri brgyad): dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs
98a6(khri brgyad): su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan
98a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / stad dag yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed de// de 'dod chags
98a8(khri brgyad): me bskyed cing / deng dang/ gti drug dang / dargyas dang / spya nga/ gsodang / bra ga dag dang / ser lnga dang / chags pa dang / sta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed pas nam yang ma mas/ 
98b1(khri brgyad): dpyi kyi zhing / rgyag par rgyun du rngus te ba 'gyung po// sems can yangasas smin par bya ba chang ma gtogs par ma ya ngan sa rnams sa mi bya'o// desems can rnams nga
98b2(khri brgyad): skye smyon par byed la/ sangs ches kyi zhing yongs pa dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas the zheng du 'gros/ bla nam du ba yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par/ 
98b3(khri brgyad): rdzog bla so ma rgyas kyi ba dang rnam yang mangs rgyas btsan len las rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// chad de ldan pa shA ro'i ba / ba ne/ byang chub sem song dpa'
98b4(khri brgyad): chen po yon tan dang phan yon de 'dang bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtsan pa mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
98b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ralab tu phyin bra la da ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dong nye bya yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa khrab
98b6(khri brgyad): nga las/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ brkyang ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang len pa rab 'byor gyi pa'id skadang ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'angs
98b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la smod na mtshan ma la stod pa lpags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
98b8(khri brgyad): la spyod par 'gas so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod do/ mtshan ma pa spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma 'gros/ 
99a1(khri brgyad): kal te gzugs la rtag ces bgying 'am mi rtag ces bkyi ba spyod na/ mtshan ma 'aspyod lhags te/ sha la spyod pa ma lags so// tshor ba dang
99a2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
99a3(khri brgyad): ma lags so// gal te gzugs la byede zhes 'gyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bkyi bar spyod na mtshan po la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
99a4(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bkyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhis bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lagaso// gal te gzugs bdag ces 'gyi ba'am 'ad/ ma mchis shes
99a5(khri brgyad): skye bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis shes ba
99a6(khri brgyad): na/ mtshan mar spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
99a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'ang med
99a8(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba'am mi dben zhes
99b1(khri brgyad): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 'am lags so// bcom ldan das byang chub sems dpa' sngam sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
99b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la yod pa thab sol mi mkhas pas/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams
99b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu blon po rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa pags
99b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa spyod 'im lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du
99b5(khri brgyad): bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa
99b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha
99b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la skom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyad pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs lo mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba la
99b8(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras
100a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol te phyin pa la sod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shang kun d+ha
100a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba / 
100a3(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre stag
100a4(khri brgyad): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid me bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no// zhes kho bo sla'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
100a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te meg la gnas shing kun tu shes te mas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ 
100a6(khri brgyad): gzugs la gnas shring kun tu shes te mos/ skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mag gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kra
100a7(khri brgyad): shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas
100a8(khri brgyad): tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te na pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas
100b1(khri brgyad): kun tu shes te mos// gal te mag ge 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen rjes grus chen / sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes
100b2(khri brgyad): temo sa/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyeni gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ 
100b3(khri brgyad): yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mika lnga dang / mngon par shes pa
100b4(khri brgyad): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / chung med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gauzugs med pa bsnyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
100b5(khri brgyad): bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
100b6(khri brgyad): dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mo san/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na bA dang / 
100b7(khri brgyad): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / ldid mi bde ba dang / 'o khrug pa dag las phongs su mi 'thar zhing / sdug bsngal la sogs pa las yongs su mi 'gro
100b8(khri brgyad): le zhes kho bo smra'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya ba'i bskal pa yang med na/ de bla na med pa yang
101a1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 'a rdzogs par chud rgya ba rga la gyur te/ ni gnas mer do// tshe dang ldan pa 'ang ga byang chub sems dpang sems
101a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dekar spyod pa ni zab la ma mkhas par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tsho nga len par po phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
101a3(khri brgyad): nyen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byod kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
101a4(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi spong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan
101a5(khri brgyad): la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyad/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya
101a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdig bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba da // zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 
101a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bad ga ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / 
101a8(khri brgyad): ninizhes bya ba dang / mazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs sted zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yi steng zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa
101b1(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / sman pa med ces bya bar ma spyod/ tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi skyong zhes bya ba dang / mtsha
101b2(khri brgyad): yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi myo/ 
101b3(khri brgyad): nga/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub se mas dpa sems pa
101b4(khri brgyad): na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mangs par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzu
101b5(khri brgyad): pa yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la skyong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor rab
101b6(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa mu yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na
101b7(khri brgyad): nyid med de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang
101b8(khri brgyad): re 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su bcu bdun dang / pha rog tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
102a1(khri brgyad): me 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas
102a2(khri brgyad): rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
102a3(khri brgyad): la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe da
102a4(khri brgyad): mkhas par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA re'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na chod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
102a5(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'gal zhig khas yin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin/ 
102a6(khri brgyad): khas mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// bas len kyang len la// bas mi len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// bos la
102a7(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ khas mi len pa yang ma yin na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub semaso dpang shes rab kyi pha rol
102a8(khri brgyad): la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
102b1(khri brgyad): 'i 'di lar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngas po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs ngas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ spyong do zhes bya
102b2(khri brgyad): AbI len/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar las me len/ spyod kyang spyad pa/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyong pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin na zhes bya bar khos me len
102b3(khri brgyad): 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos pa med pa'i rang bzhin du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams
102b4(khri brgyad): panyid dang nye ba yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub
102b5(khri brgyad): pa sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phul du bya ba/ tshad med pa/ nges pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams/ 
102b6(khri brgyad): ngadang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
102b7(khri brgyad): rere dus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
102b8(khri brgyad): de'atshang rgya'am/ 'od te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
103a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ conang ldan parab 'byor ti nga 'dzin gnanang
103a2(khri brgyad): gis gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
103a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
103a4(khri brgyad): ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng gi rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting
103a5(khri brgyad): na dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshar tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sa shi ni tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
103a6(khri brgyad): cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbying 'dres pa ne byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting
103a7(khri brgyad): dzedzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
103a8(khri brgyad): dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal
103b1(khri brgyad): phyag r+b+ha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dun dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon me za bar 'jug pa
103b2(khri brgyad): zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dag sngal 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting
103b3(khri brgyad): dang / brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na ma ma/ bA 'a khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i
103b4(khri brgyad): 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
103b5(khri brgyad): dge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
103b6(khri brgyad): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba re ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sbyin ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od
103b7(khri brgyad): mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med
103b8(khri brgyad): 'i ting nge ngan dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi dang / glog gi smon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba
104a1(khri brgyad): de 'dzi la/ gzi brjed yod pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mig yang zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin dang / 'gyung ram
104a2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sman ma zhes bya ba'i tingeng 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i
104a3(khri brgyad): snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting de'i dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes
104a4(khri brgyad): nyi nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya'i
104a5(khri brgyad): de 'dzin dang / chos thams der mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par
104a6(khri brgyad): 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ga mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba nas/ 
104a7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i 'dzin dang / ming nges par
104a8(khri brgyad): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i tingangange 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
104b1(khri brgyad): n+da sa/  yod pa sa bya ba'i ting la na dang / yul las rgal ga zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yon tan thams cad po tshogs su grupa zhes bya ba ri 'jom dang/ sems med par gnas
104b2(khri brgyad): ba'i ti 'dzin dang / dag pa'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan la grwa yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' las pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin das pa
104b3(khri brgyad): nyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bi'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya
104b4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i /  de 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par sgru pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam pa gcig
104b5(khri brgyad): zhes bya de'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa dor pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa sa srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra thams ca la 'jug pa zhes
104b6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me smon zhes bya ba'i ting de'i dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i
104b7(khri brgyad): depa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dka' ba med pa zhes bya ba
104b8(khri brgyad): ba zang mi shes pa'i ma mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i
105a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gul ba dang 'gog pa tham sa cang yang dag par ni pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od
105a2(khri brgyad): / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya bI'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // 
105a3(khri brgyad): bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing
105a4(khri brgyad): rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes
105a5(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brtan pa med pal brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par
105a6(khri brgyad): sel ba zhes bya bi ra ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa
105a7(khri brgyad): / zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byung du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
105a8(khri brgyad): pang 'chang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu de dag ni byeng chub sems dpa' mim spyad par chen po ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzid de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni myur blan med pa yang dun 'ardzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzog sag du rgya s+ho// gang labasrabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dang 'tshan po rnams myur du tha dzang
105b2(khri brgyad): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang su 'i'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo cheng mad grangs yang pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus chod
105b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu al la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshe
105b4(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
105b5(khri brgyad): kruklung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
105b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de sa nr-i ting nge 'dzin
105b7(khri brgyad): kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des
105b8(khri brgyad): drom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
106a1(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor ci ting ngeng dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dbang sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin ga/ shegs pa klu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasu rgya
106a2(khri brgyad): kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rangab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa Sho bu de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri buM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan lnga/ ting nge 'dzin
106a3(khri brgyad): gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting 'dzin yin la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro// shA
106a4(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mAnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' la
106a5(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin byang chub sems dpa'i nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na ting nge'i 'dzin pa ston par nus sam ra
106a6(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis klas pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu de ni ma yin ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rims kyi bu des ci ting nge'i dzin de dag kung tu shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
106a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun te shes pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer gyi ltar kun tu shes pa med/ rab 'byor sdes smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par
106a8(khri brgyad): ra mi byed pa ltar ro// shA rir bu bklas pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog/ par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyi 'grub pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir de kur te nge'i dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par
106b1(khri brgyad): /  da gyur byar pa grangs des ma/ rigs kyi grangs da dzin de dag rnam par mi shes she/ kun tu mi shes so// sha re bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan par nga 'gyu 'byung na/ 
106b2(khri brgyad): ki kun tu me shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ti nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par mi shes shing kun tu ma shes so// 
106b3(khri brgyad): com ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs sa zhes bya ba phyin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de
106b4(khri brgyad): te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so// legs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// bsam sa
106b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// 
106b6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dkal yang de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
106b7(khri brgyad): po shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'di ltar slob pa shes rab rje pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
106b8(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po desar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du
107a1(khri brgyad): gtam ce 'aro phyin pa dang / btsan 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i rol tu byen pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyid pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha ros phyin pa
107a2(khri brgyad): deyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la skab ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du sangs
107a3(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
107a4(khri brgyad): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
107a5(khri brgyad): khu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bca
107a6(khri brgyad): snga 'das zhig ming migs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin// rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmig so// shes pa po dang / mthong ba pa'i bar
107a7(khri brgyad): drag mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug
107a8(khri brgyad): me dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / las mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs / 
107b1(khri brgyad): gzugs meng pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag me dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
107b2(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag med migs sa// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mo dmigs// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir la na cig phyir 'ong ba dang / bIr re 'odra ba dang / 
107b3(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so// 
107b4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
107b5(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ ba
107b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos grang dag la slong pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang
107b7(khri brgyad): chu ba sem lda pa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang mi slob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa sa so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de la
107b8(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag jiH/ bur mchi me lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de skar yod pa/ 
108a1(khri brgyad): daltar ya ma yin pas/ dar byad ma rig pa zhes bya// shA ri'i bus pa/  lA pA/ bcom ldan 'das ca'i slad du mchis ma la kas dAl ma rig pa zhes pa
108a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngas pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar kye phyir gzugs yang po ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
108a3(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi bya
108a4(khri brgyad): khrims dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba
108a5(khri brgyad): debyang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
108a6(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa
108a7(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lta ste rtag pa dang / chad pa'i mtha' gnyid la chags pas na/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i
108a8(khri brgyad): de dag yongs su brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
108b1(khri brgyad): rjer dag la yang mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtag par byed pa'i phyir te/ de dag ma ru dang ba ben na// ca zhag
108b2(khri brgyad): mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes me mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes ma mthong ngo // khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel
108b3(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir bris pa zhes bya ba'i grangs
108b4(khri brgyad): yin no// de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'a
108b5(khri brgyad): ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yir ro// de dag ni ma dad pa yin te
108b6(khri brgyad): lam dang ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar mya dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no// de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig
108b7(khri brgyad): pa mi gnas she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rob tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas
108b8(khri brgyad): kyi rol phyin pa // shes rab kyi po ngos tu phyin pa la meso// phyi sa ldog pa'i mal mi gnas sa/ sa sas rnams kyi bar dgal mi gnas pa yin to/ 
109a1(khri brgyad): pa rnams shes bya'o// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ci zhig la mngon par bzhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du she
109a2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// mig la mngan par zhen pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon pa
109a3(khri brgyad): yin no// gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la
109a4(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// byang chub kyi bar dag
109a5(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
109a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang
109a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
109a8(khri brgyad): pa 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma logs
109b1(khri brgyad): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam gA/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thubs
109b2(khri brgyad): la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
109b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyi
109b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed de/ shA dwa'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
109b5(khri brgyad): bo ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad ma byan pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
109b6(khri brgyad): bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dnges par mi 'byung ba lags yod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ shI ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
109b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yi mi nang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra
109b8(khri brgyad): nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sob ba lags shing / ji lar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom
110a1(khri brgyad): rngan das rgyas bka' stsal pa/ shA ri 'tha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kya rol tu ldan pa la spyad pa grang gime shes rab kyi pha rol/ phyin pa med migs yang dag
110a2(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthang na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
110a3(khri brgyad): 'byung ngo // de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
110a4(khri brgyad): la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
110a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyo
110a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
110a7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhye
110a8(khri brgyad): 'brang ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan ma'i le'u shes bya ste dgu pa'i// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
110b1(khri brgyad): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dre ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
110b2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtshan/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dre ba del ji skad bstan par bgyi/ de bzhin du ni skar ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol
110b3(khri brgyad): dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad
110b4(khri brgyad): bakhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang
110b5(khri brgyad): rdzophyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'a bar dag la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
110b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyu dro ma zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dra ba de la ji skad bstan par bkye/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod nyid la dris/ khyod
110b7(khri brgyad): ra bzod pa de lan thob shig/ rab 'byor 'dasam du sems/ sam yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ snyam yang gas na la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
110b8(khri brgyad): / rnam par shes pa yang gakan zhig yin snga ma 'am/ rab 'byar kyis gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor 'de ji snyam
111a1(khri brgyad): mas rnam yang gzhan la/ mig kyang gzhan nog yor snyama'am/ sgyum yang gzhan la/ rna ba dang sna dang / l+ya dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin nama'
111a2(khri brgyad): ma yang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyum yang gzhan la/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bye dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan shig yin snyam 'am/ snyam yang
111a3(khri brgyad): la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu mi yang gzhan la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa
111a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyum yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin su ma 'am/ skyem yang gzhan la/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa
111a5(khri brgyad): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te ga pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yon snyam 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a
111a6(khri brgyad): de ni ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer 'di ri snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba/ 
111a7(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan nig yin snyam 'am/ snga ma yid gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkye
111a8(khri brgyad): rab dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde'i'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ 
111b1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ de ba yang ma len pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
111b2(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'ag/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// 
111b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyum yang / nan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan shig yin snyama'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin
111b4(khri brgyad): 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la smon pa med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dri ji snyam du
111b5(khri brgyad): sems/ sgyum yang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ snga ma yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig
111b6(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyum yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams
111b7(khri brgyad): khyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gan
111b8(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sa ma nyid 'ang gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sa mi yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
112a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan da par shepa nyid dpa par shes pa lags so// 
112a2(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ skye ma nyid kyang pags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
112a3(khri brgyad): lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma la gas la/ sgyum nyid kyang yid lags so// bcom ldan 'das snyam
112a4(khri brgyad): ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs legs so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ 
112a5(khri brgyad): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu mnyad kyang chos rnams lagaso// bcom ldan 'das snyam
112a6(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skam lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes
112a7(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yad kyi
112a8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa yang ga/ zhan me lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan
112b1(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig ge 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te/ 
112b2(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
112b3(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ skye mnyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi
112b4(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
112b5(khri brgyad): kyis tsher ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ 
112b6(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das spro ma yang gzhan mi lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus
112b7(khri brgyad): tereg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal
112b8(khri brgyad): ba 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ 
113a1(khri brgyad): srog bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang snyam lags la/ skam nyid kyang yid kyi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba bde pa'am/ sdug bcwa
113a2(khri brgyad): 'am/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so// bco mo ldan 'das snyam yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su bcu rtsa bdun yang gzhan ma
113a3(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sam cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lags so// bcom
113a4(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma legs te// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags so// sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das skye
113a5(khri brgyad): ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lpags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa
113a6(khri brgyad): so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
113a7(khri brgyad): bam mchis pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sna
113a8(khri brgyad): rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu me nyid kyi mi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa
113b1(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so// 
113b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das snya ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra ma lags la/ 
113b3(khri brgyad): sgyusnya ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ ska ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba
113b4(khri brgyad): yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am/ 
113b5(khri brgyad): 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dadi ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye
113b6(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams
113b7(khri brgyad): bakhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// 
113b8(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len
114a1(khri brgyad): phung po lnga pa 'di dgal 'das ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba mang ge padas pa skad dug dgas su yad dpa/ rab 'byar gyis gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das de nams
114a2(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems med gi 'das pa skad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba'am/ 'gag
114a3(khri brgyad): ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mangs pa'am/ rnam par bang bdag dmigs su yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
114a4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems gang la med dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brdas med pa dang gdags pa med pa dang tha skad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / mang du gdags pa med pa dang / 
114a5(khri brgyad): lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mo
114a6(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
114a7(khri brgyad): par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
114a8(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
114b1(khri brgyad): // rab 'byang rgyas gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi la ldan pa la de ltar slob cing / blan med pa yang dag pa po ga
114b2(khri brgyad): byang chub tu nges par 'gyung byang 'tshal bas ni snye ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcomaldan
114b3(khri brgyad): 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgra ma'i skyes bur rig pa rab kyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
114b4(khri brgyad): lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjeb por 'gyur snyam la
114b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga pa dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lagasal// 
114b6(khri brgyad): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rme lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes
114b7(khri brgyad): bak+Shi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de mi 'bang lag
114b8(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zho na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// / 
115a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'phyar 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha lta ba 'phung po lnga pa dag dang / ma g.yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyum lta
115a2(khri brgyad): smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
115a3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
115a4(khri brgyad): yod yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma yang dngos pa ma mchis phyi ba rang bzhin/ smig rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang ba
115a5(khri brgyad): sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis
115a6(khri brgyad): srid // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags
115a7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung ba lnga po dge lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing / dngos po med
115a8(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ang
115b1(khri brgyad): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dang shing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
115b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa lagasar du yang dag par zhugs pa yang yin la/ thabs la yang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes
115b3(khri brgyad): gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma song na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dang bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
115b4(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
115b5(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag
115b6(khri brgyad): rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
115b7(khri brgyad): shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes ra
115b8(khri brgyad): par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba da
116a1(khri brgyad): gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / nye ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa
116a2(khri brgyad): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor bar
116a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes bra la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa
116a4(khri brgyad): ni ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
116a5(khri brgyad): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
116a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba drag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
116a7(khri brgyad): na pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// 
116a8(khri brgyad): yas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
116b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// mor
116b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtag ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
116b3(khri brgyad): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du
116b4(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar se ser rtag ste/ de yang med migs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
116b5(khri brgyad): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar
116b6(khri brgyad): so sor tog+ha ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
116b7(khri brgyad): 'i'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la stong zhes
116b8(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar sa sor rtog ste/ de yang med mags so// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan
117a1(khri brgyad): ma mang cas byab ngas sar rtag ste/ de yang ma dmigs so// gzugs la sman pa mad ces bya ba mas tog ste/ de yang mi dmigs sa// char bdang / 'du shes dang / 'dubya
117a2(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang me dmigs so// gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// 
117a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de
117a4(khri brgyad): dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar ma song rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sem
117a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sem/ 
117a6(khri brgyad): bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / na
117a7(khri brgyad): shes pa me rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / 
117a8(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 
117b1(khri brgyad): nas dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug 'asngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mi shes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces
117b2(khri brgyad): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dpon zhes bya bar chos bstan par byas/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dang
117b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag me dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// 
117b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs me rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang
117b5(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
117b6(khri brgyad): byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba drag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rnam
117b7(khri brgyad): bar shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs
117b8(khri brgyad): shes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzug mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la
118a1(khri brgyad): dbang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam ba shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes bzhi zhes bya ba dang / ma
118a2(khri brgyad): shes pa skyong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa da'an
118a3(khri brgyad): bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rog tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ des na bya/ 
118a4(khri brgyad): tu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
118a5(khri brgyad): rnyed pa na/ chos ga dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med ci'i rnam pa dang / ni ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang mtsho
118a6(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba mad pa'i drab pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par mo song rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'od ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' se
118a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po me skrag mi dngas ning dang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidang
118a8(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba po mer rtsog ste// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dngag
118b1(khri brgyad): gi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs sngang zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar matsa
118b2(khri brgyad): tog ste/ de yang me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshod dang / 'du shes dang / 'a byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / 
118b3(khri brgyad): dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing / de yang me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya
118b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid ma bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing / brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu bya
118b5(khri brgyad): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
118b6(khri brgyad): ba gang gi tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa dag ge skabs me 'byed pa de
118b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub bdems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi
118b8(khri brgyad): dang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byas chu' sems dpa' sems raba' chen po ses rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la khyo pa ts+li Sha lidi kyang mo yong rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis ga rakas
119a1(khri brgyad): / gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// char ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'a byed rnams dang / rnam pa nyid kyis ma shes pastong pa ma
119a2(khri brgyad): bye/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang miga'o/ 
119a3(khri brgyad): lnga dang lce dang / lus dang yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs
119a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// skad de dang / ro dag byang dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
119a5(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i na
119a6(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 
119a7(khri brgyad): mapar shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg
119a8(khri brgyad): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / snre'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'du
119b1(khri brgyad): rig pa stong pa nyid kyis yid ci 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yan / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid pang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig shi dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyi
119b2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis mor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
119b3(khri brgyad): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshan gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen cis tshor ba dang / 
119b4(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid byang
119b5(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
119b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag pa'i spyod ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dmas dang / dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam gyi stong
119b7(khri brgyad): kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi lam nyed kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lamamo// stabs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas
119b8(khri brgyad): rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab
120a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ thabs dadang ldanan bya
120a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dang zhing da bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang
120a3(khri brgyad): yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nam
120a4(khri brgyad): sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag des la gzugs mi rtag ces bya
120a5(khri brgyad): chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
120a6(khri brgyad): sumi bsngo pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skyon
120a7(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems
120a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs snga
120b1(khri brgyad): ba nas bya bar ston/ bdag mad nas bya ba dang / zhe zhes bya ba dang / sto zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med cas bya ba dang / slad yang cas bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba mang ces bya ba dang / dben nas bya
120b2(khri brgyad): na te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / 
120b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rton/ bdag mad ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya
120b4(khri brgyad): na pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad ma
120b5(khri brgyad): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
120b6(khri brgyad): par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag mad ces bya ba
120b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bab dang / mngon par 'du bya ba mang ces bya ba dang dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston
120b8(khri brgyad): rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sa ngas mas kyisar yongs su pi bslab dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lca dang pus dang yid mi rtag
121a1(khri brgyad): bya bar ston// sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ne zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya 'dang / smon pa med ces bya'ang / mngon pa
121a2(khri brgyad): ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang
