121a3(khri brgyad): byas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste// rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa
121a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtsha
121a5(khri brgyad): da ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam
121a6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du skra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal na
121a7(khri brgyad): dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston
121a8(khri brgyad): deyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su mi bsda ste/ rab
121b1(khri brgyad): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thams dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rabya 'byor gzhan lang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gdang
121b2(khri brgyad): del mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig ge 'dus te ga/ pa dang / mig ge 'dus kyi ga pa'i rkyen gyi mtshor ba me rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /  nas
121b3(khri brgyad): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
121b4(khri brgyad): ga' rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su mi bsngob dang / de bzhin du ra pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / na ba'i 'alus te rig pa dang / rnams
121b5(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis mor pa dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / 
121b6(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya
121b7(khri brgyad): chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
121b8(khri brgyad): bske rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba
122a1(khri brgyad): tha shas gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams martag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa
122a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtags par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po
122a3(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang me migs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
122a4(khri brgyad): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas
122a5(khri brgyad): dres pa rnams me rtag ces bya bar chos ston ci/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing skam du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pab rgyal gyis ston pa dang / byang chub sgom du gzhus
122a6(khri brgyad): 'iphyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan pas kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sor
122a7(khri brgyad): ma ba stob ste/ rab 'byor ba/  byang chubasams dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po'idas pa'i bshes gcan nams// de ga gis yongs su phyin pan bstan pa nyid pos na mimag sepas / 
122a8(khri brgyad): dang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasa'i ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi rol phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la ma mkhas pas
122b1(khri brgyad): sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dang zhing dang bar 'gyur ba'
122b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
122b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'a
122b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims sde pha rol tu zhen pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor
122b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar
122b6(khri brgyad): yid la byed/ gzugs kyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
122b7(khri brgyad): dadang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam
122b8(khri brgyad): par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po
123a1(khri brgyad): za nyid stong pa nyid theb dpa dmigs te/ dmigs pa sems kya / mig na to pa shes bya bar med pa byed tshig stong pa nas byang 'i sa skye
123a2(khri brgyad): mig kyi dang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sto pa dres bya ba'i bar du med la byed cing / stong ma nyid de dag kyang dmigs me/ dpags pa'i tshul gyis rlabasem su
123a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i
123a4(khri brgyad): dastong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ darigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / 
123a5(khri brgyad): mas la yang bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / snang / 
123a6(khri brgyad): dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te rib pa dang / mig gi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyi mtshor ba dang / na bu dang / sna dang / lha dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang sna
123a7(khri brgyad): bya brang yid la byed/ byistong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyid spyod pa bya bar yid la byung/ ngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid song pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag
123a8(khri brgyad): dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlomasams bu byed pa dang / de bzhid du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang
123b1(khri brgyad): / phyi dang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gi
123b2(khri brgyad): rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
123b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dag dang bral bas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du yang
123b4(khri brgyad): pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
123b5(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing / de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i chu
123b6(khri brgyad): dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
123b7(khri brgyad): pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/ dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i mug pa
123b8(khri brgyad): chis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
124a1(khri brgyad): / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por sdig pa'i grogs po ni kwa 'di skad du ri ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ngas rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma
124a2(khri brgyad): grubs par mi bya'o// 'di dag ni ltan dgas ma lan ci nga ba po yin pas 'de dag ni mnyan par me bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// phun chub par mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// bsgom pa
124a3(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol/ phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du yin pa dang / bzod
124a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por reg pa
124a5(khri brgyad): / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bskur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
124a6(khri brgyad): 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci shig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la
124a7(khri brgyad): bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyad la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig pa zhes zer dang 'bral bar byed do// 
124a8(khri brgyad): zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing bdud kyi nyas pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byar
124b1(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen par ldan pang grags pan 'di ltar bdud sdug can sangs rgyas ci cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung 'ongs na/ 
124b2(khri brgyad): na nas dang ldan pa'i mnga'i sna dang / dbyangs kyis bskrad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i ste dang/ da lta zla zung ba'i bye dang / smras par byas dang/ gleng gamang ste dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i slongs
124b3(khri brgyad): da/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing / bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi snyan pa
124b4(khri brgyad): pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i sogs
124b5(khri brgyad): poni/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang mang ngo // 
124b6(khri brgyad): da ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no// khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya bar yang mi nus sogs zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod mi ston
124b7(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'
124b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i drung du 'angs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // na ba dang / snga dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag dang bdag gi
125a1(khri brgyad): snang ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / rag bya dang / chos rnams na bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig ga rnam par shes pa na bdag dang bdag gis stong do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
125a2(khri brgyad): sna'i rnab par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kye rnam par shes pa de bdag dang bdag gis kyang nga // mig ge 'dus te dag pa ni badrug gis stong // 
125a3(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / 
125a4(khri brgyad): rab ni bdag dang ba dag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba dang / snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus
125a5(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
125a6(khri brgyad): byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nyabar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag da
125a7(khri brgyad): gis stong ngo // yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang la ma dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dra
125a8(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag
125b1(khri brgyad): mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor nga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan par sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdug can sangs rgyas kyi ma byad du
125b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drang du 'ongs nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnam
125b3(khri brgyad): sto ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do// de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnamasapa
125b4(khri brgyad): nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med de nas zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod ma ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni bya
125b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du
125b6(khri brgyad): du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sa nges rgyas dang ldan pa'i phyed la byed po dag la 'doms te/ rjes su ston par byed de zhes bdud kyi
125b7(khri brgyad): rarerig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi
125b8(khri brgyad): dang bak+Shar mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed pa dag dang bral
126a1(khri brgyad): byang cing/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phags par lam lan rgya pa ba dag la yang sbyor bar byed stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / sdod pa med par
126a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams la yang spong bar byed cing / 'di sang du rigs se tha khyod gyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la can thos kyis mngon sa ma du skyes bya// blan med pa la ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis cizhig
126a3(khri brgyad): ra ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu dag me rjod ma ston pa gang yin par ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig cam
126a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang du bsnu cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i drung ngas nas/ 'di ga du rigs kyi brag gi danani du bskal pa cad med pa pa med par 'khor sa na la gling lag pagasad
126a5(khri brgyad): rkang pa gcad pa dang / mgog cad pa dpag tu med bdag nyams su kyong bar 'gyur zhing/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ ga
126a6(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis 'ashig gang yang gra bcom pa nyid kyi 'byas bu mngon sum dubyar yod pad la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag
126a7(khri brgyad): ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i phyogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bskur cing / byang chub
126a8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drug du 'ongs nas/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stang zhes
126b1(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma mad ces bya ba dang / smon pa mad ces bya ba dang / mngadapa radu bya ba mad ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dag / sA dang / lU dang / lus dang / 
126b2(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / she zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dag mtshan ma mang ces bya ba dang / smod pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
126b3(khri brgyad): ce bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
126b4(khri brgyad): dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul rje rkang pan na
126b5(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam me rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
126b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces
126b7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
126b8(khri brgyad): sa bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag marjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas
127a1(khri brgyad): sa.u bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyin pa khre brgyar stong pa las/ mA//  g+sa nas bya // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
127a2(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
127a3(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor byang chub
127a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' la skye ba dang yod pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/ sems dpa' la yang gzhi med de/ da lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi ma
127a5(khri brgyad): pa'i don to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
127a6(khri brgyad): da/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di la skyed per na/ skam lagazhi med cing mi dmigs so// 
127a7(khri brgyad): ga r+b+ha dang / chu zla dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de 'izhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don
127a8(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi 'don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// 
127b1(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mnor pa de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhan nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyed dang / chos spyon ma
127b2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs
127b3(khri brgyad): rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
127b4(khri brgyad): / chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi ma
127b5(khri brgyad): dmigs so// gzugs dang / swa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
127b6(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes
127b7(khri brgyad): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du
127b8(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi
128a1(khri brgyad): med ched me dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chu sem mas dpa' ched ldan myed pa la spyod pa 'byung ma
128a2(khri brgyad): so//  byor 'di myed pad/ smra na'i skyes grang sa pa mdo 'a ba tad stong pa nyid kyi ba la spyod 'ge'i 'don kyang po cing mid migs so// ba 'byor ba zhin du kyang chu memed
128a3(khri brgyad): pa ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu drad pa nye bar gzhag
128a4(khri brgyad): rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'de lta ste dper na/ sku ba'i skyes bu'aphags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
128a5(khri brgyad): dang / mi rigs pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la sa pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
128a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi ros gyi la byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi 'don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkribacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
128a7(khri brgyad): la gzugs kyaga'i bed cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don
128a8(khri brgyad): cid me dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs gas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // 
128b1(khri brgyad): pa'i gzhimed cing me dmigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// 
128b2(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gdizhi med do// rna bo dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de sa
128b3(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ga'i'i dor kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
128b4(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do// dngos po med pa'id kyi bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dang
128b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
128b6(khri brgyad): ba sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gshe med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
128b7(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gdin med do// 
128b8(khri brgyad): byas kyi khams la yang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi lazhi med do// rab 'byor de bshad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
129a1(khri brgyad): gan 'don med do// rab 'bye di dped /  de bzhin du byang chung sa dpa' sems dpa' tshan pa sher
129a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di la me dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med par
129a3(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa lag med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
129a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i dod med do// rang 'byor kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags
129a5(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs po ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar lag // de ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skye ba
129a6(khri brgyad): da pa la gzugs kyi gzhi med do// skye ba med po la tshor ba dang / shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor kun nas nyon
129a7(khri brgyad): phongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugasani med do// kur ram nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
129a8(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do// de bzhi du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi ga ni med do// kud dang nyon po
129b1(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do// skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
129b2(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byed pa med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do// rab
129b3(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
129b4(khri brgyad): med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
129b5(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
129b6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa' bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sa
129b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
129b8(khri brgyad): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
130a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma 'ga' med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem
130a2(khri brgyad): na pa shes rab kyis ba/ khyen pa la sno pa'i bya chubs mas de pa gzhi'i don med// de bzhin sa rnas s+ya dang/ skyes ched dang / na mi 'grel bar 'byung ba shin/ rnam par dgapa
130a3(khri brgyad): tshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzha 'don med do// de bzhin du
130a4(khri brgyad): mched dang / rten cing brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma gzhi med do// rab 'bor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
130a5(khri brgyad): ba sems dpa'i gzhi 'don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnamapar dag pa la mtshan mi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
130a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi redan med do// rab 'byor 'di saste dper na/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / 
130a7(khri brgyad): dang / bya chub rgya yan lag nga / lam nga/ sto sa coM dang/ 'jigs pa dang / mam yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi dag byin rnam par dag
130a8(khri brgyad): ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'ad sa ska
130b1(khri brgyad): bdag med pa'i khye/ bdag shin tu rnam par dga' la kun mad// gas pa ngam ma pa mad pa byang// gas ba dang/ nga pa' ra sacanam lda dag pa lag zhi med do// rab byong na
130b2(khri brgyad): rgyab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 'arol sbyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa len ni don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste per na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sha ba la mun pa'ogazhi me
130b3(khri brgyad): byod de bzhin byung chub sems dpa sems dpanga' chen po shes kyi sa/ phyin pa ma spyod pa byang chub sems dpa gni 'don med // rab 'gyur 'di// skye dper na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa la
130b4(khri brgyad): daci gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
130b5(khri brgyad): zhen gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la 'tshal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
130b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi ma rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sa sa dngapa'i gzhi 'don med do// rab 'bor 'di sa ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin lan mo pa ga yed pa'i gzhi med do// de bzhin ga
130b7(khri brgyad): 'i shes rasngal 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa pa rnas par grol ba la rnam pa sa grol pa'i gzi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
130b8(khri brgyad): dkrol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi
131a1(khri brgyad): yad do// rab 'byor 'drem ste dbar na/ nyi ma dang rna ba'i 'od pa mun pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'a'i gna'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nang bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gzha med de// rab 'byor
131a3(khri brgyad): zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen ba
131a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral kye lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'o lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang
131a5(khri brgyad): ngas ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
131a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
131a7(khri brgyad): nga yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa rtse
131a8(khri brgyad): ga'adi ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par
131b1(khri brgyad): rgya sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pas chos thams cad khong du chud bar bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yang lags/ byang chub sems pa
131b2(khri brgyad): thos chos thams cad kyi mamachis pa nyid la ni de sdang bslab pa sa rtse/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
131b3(khri brgyad): la ba/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang
131b4(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ldan ma rdo' dang bcas pa dang / Sha na mai ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go// rab 'byer de dag
131b5(khri brgyad): thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
131b6(khri brgyad): cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no// // shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bram po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i cho
131b7(khri brgyad): rags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ 'jig rten gyi'i dge
131b8(khri brgyad): rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa la sa byung ba'i bsad nams bya ba'i ngo po dag tshul khrims la byung ba dang / bsgom pa la byung ba'i bsod na pas phyib 'dangos po dang / shal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / tha
132a1(khri brgyad): / la lakhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam pa bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dbus gnags pa
132a2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sbas pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i
132a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba ni dang / 'jig rten po'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran
132a4(khri brgyad): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / 
132a5(khri brgyad): togs pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos med ge
132a6(khri brgyad): brnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun
132a7(khri brgyad): ba dang phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par
132a8(khri brgyad): ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge 'a rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams ga
132b1(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung dum
132b2(khri brgyad): bstan pa'o// nga po rje ni lung dus bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa'i skams par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung dub bstan pa'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
132b3(khri brgyad): nilung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags
132b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa 'chas rnams shes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang // khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 
132b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang
132b6(khri brgyad): ba de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyil gsol pa/ bcod ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkara' stsal pa/ 'jig rten las
132b7(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun pa
132b8(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par zad pa'i sgom tshan mi med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang
133a1(khri brgyad): 'drog / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas par ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyad pa'i te
133a2(khri brgyad): bi rtag mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 
133a3(khri brgyad): can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa
133a4(khri brgyad): du mos pa 'di ni nam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi
133a5(khri brgyad): shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' ma thams so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ba skyabs te gnas pa'i 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
133a6(khri brgyad): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad
133a7(khri brgyad): ma shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang
133a8(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes
133b1(khri brgyad): / skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor pa 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
133b2(khri brgyad): pa dang lce/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
133b3(khri brgyad): tan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med par pyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
133b4(khri brgyad): tan gnyis pa bslabs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bra ba bas gtad snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can len te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis glang de dran pa
133b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde
133b6(khri brgyad): ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad dus
133b7(khri brgyad): kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha'
133b8(khri brgyad): yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' ya
134a1(khri brgyad): mched bsrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bas
134a2(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bslabs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad
134a3(khri brgyad): med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag nas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku'o// rang
134a4(khri brgyad): sa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
134a5(khri brgyad): bco brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / 
134a6(khri brgyad): / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med
134a7(khri brgyad): / pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
134a8(khri brgyad): 'i lam lan bag brgyad pa dang / stongs bcu dang / me 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag na
134b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhen/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 'du
134b2(khri brgyad): bya rdzog sa pa'i chos byang chub kyi chogs kyi mas sum bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyichos ma drem pa bco ba rgyad kyi ba dag kyang yin// ded/ de 'as byas tshos nams shes byam
134b3(khri brgyad): sa byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag lnga skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur bar mi sdang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zang pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 
134b4(khri brgyad): nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos sde dbyings dang / ches gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas
134b5(khri brgyad): chos rnams shes bya'o// de la bud mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni
134b6(khri brgyad): thun mo dge chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhen/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sumacu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so mo yang
134b7(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thur pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
134b8(khri brgyad): da chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gomatshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma
135a1(khri brgyad): yin par bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis sram pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe rang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol
135a2(khri brgyad): bcam ldan 'das bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen zhes pa rtse ci'i rma nga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes pa kye/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
135a3(khri brgyad): sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi res phul po che'i phal byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
135a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang la
135a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyis dang / brgyan pa dang / rgyun nu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ang ba dang / phyir/ 
135a6(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
135a7(khri brgyad): bar dag go// rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / se can ci'i sapal pa che zhes bya ste/ byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la bya
135a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos do rtsubu'i sems paskyed de/ sems can gyi chog chen po dang / sems can gyi rim pal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bco
135b1(khri brgyad): 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu sa
135b2(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis gom bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid baspyad pa
135b3(khri brgyad): bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las/ 
135b4(khri brgyad): 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la snga
135b5(khri brgyad): 'o// bdag gis thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o// chas rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpa
135b6(khri brgyad): dpa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas
135b7(khri brgyad): sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de// rab la
135b8(khri brgyad): zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cam sdugs
136a1(khri brgyad): kyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa de dag gi dod na bdag gi drug bsngal kyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o sab tu sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136a2(khri brgyad): du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can de dag phung pa'i lug me med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis sa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur rje bar du sems can gcig
136a3(khri brgyad): pang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung po'i lhags pa
136a4(khri brgyad): bA dad las 'das bya'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mgyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o// 
136a5(khri brgyad): sa gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rdza ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs pas gas la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
136a6(khri brgyad): nga byer snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//  byed kyang chu ba sems dpa' sems pa yin thams pas bskyed par ngam bste/ de la sem sa chupasems dpa' sems par
136a7(khri brgyad): chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems cad kyi ris phal po che 'phrul phyed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems pang rigs sems can
136a8(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi yul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs pa ma rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' mams dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po ma ni/ gang sems dang
136b1(khri brgyad): pa nas bzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems me bskyed/ 
136b2(khri brgyad): bste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi yul du phyin par byed cing / des rlom sems su'ang mi byed do// rab 'a
136b3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgrub pa'i sems su bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems me skul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams
136b4(khri brgyad): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlob sems bu mi byed partse/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi stsal ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
136b5(khri brgyad): can pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ophan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems ca
136b6(khri brgyad): thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtor la/ des rlo bo sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so// 8
136b7(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan
136b8(khri brgyad): 'ang bya chub bams dpa' mamasada' chen pa tag par rgyun byos 'dapa bya// ngas la dgar bya'o// cham la dran tudas bar bya// chas ma phun dadaga' ba dpa 'byor pa brtson pa bya'o// 
137a1(khri brgyad): chos gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ chos thams cad byeng med pa ste/ de ni chos gas pa'o// shes/ cho la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod pa zhes 'o// 
137a2(khri brgyad): de la tshag la dga' bgang zhe na/ gang chu la dga' zhing bangan par dka ba/ de ni chos la dka' byazhes bya'o// dung tshas la kun tu dag ba gang zhe na/ gang rgyas la yon tan dang / 
137a3(khri brgyad): lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba des bya'o// de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ rin chos pa kun tu dga' shA rna
137a4(khri brgyad): brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byar byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab che pha rol tu phyin pa la de la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sa ral pa
137a5(khri brgyad): tshe'i rdul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang
137a6(khri brgyad): laganas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byad// de yang me dmigs pa'i tshul
137a7(khri brgyad): kyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
137a8(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa dang / sos yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad kyi bar dgul gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems
137b1(khri brgyad): che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ro/ lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
137b2(khri brgyad): gnas pas/ rnams pa snyi chags pa med pas rnam par dgror zhing gos pa mad pa'i pa na gyi ba la gnas te/ samamacan ci tshogs ched pod/ sems can gyi re yal pa ci'i dul du sbyi par bya ste/ de la
137b3(khri brgyad): tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi
137b4(khri brgyad): poche'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 
137b5(khri brgyad): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag
137b6(khri brgyad): spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang kang byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
137b7(khri brgyad): bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang brag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang
137b8(khri brgyad): byed pa'i dang / byed bu 'jug pa 'o dang / glang ba po ga kun nas slong pa po dang / 
138a1(khri brgyad): par lta ba dang / med par lba ba dang / phung por lta ba dang // khams bug+ha ba dang / skye mched du lnga ba dang / bden par lta ba dang // ra cing 'bral bar 'byung bang lnga ba dang / pha la
138a2(khri brgyad): par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lta ba dang / sems can yongs su sten par bkye bar lta ba dang / 
138a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo sar bar lta ba dang / yongs su
138a4(khri brgyad): las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang
138a5(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba le ra/ tshor ba dang / 
138a6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dus par 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la bya
138a7(khri brgyad): / chuchu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga ba bskyed do// de bzhin tshor ba dang
138a8(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga ba bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs gang dmigs
138b1(khri brgyad): ba bskyed de/ tshe dang dran pa rab 'byod de'i phyird/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyung ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du b+ha bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub
138b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lnga ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan par ba
138b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
138b4(khri brgyad): khyod spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems me mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun meng ma lags pa'i
138b5(khri brgyad): sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ don des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
138b6(khri brgyad): sems de ni bag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang
138b7(khri brgyad): pam mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bupa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ced ces smras so// 
138b8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems me mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/ 
139a1(khri brgyad): dang rgyan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa pa dzin bu 'dal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyen cang chos gang la yang skye ba 'am 'gag par yang dag par
139a2(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri re bu gangs
139a3(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun rdzas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi
139a4(khri brgyad): sems med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa
139a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod
139a6(khri brgyad): ris 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sebs zag pa med pa/ khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
139a7(khri brgyad): gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dag 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'i bu de de
139a8(khri brgyad): bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sumacu rtsa bdun dang / 
139b1(khri brgyad): / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par reg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'bram pa rnams kyi mar du yang chags pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis ri
139b2(khri brgyad): dadu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang zag pa med ci/ khongs su gtog zhab ma yin ma zhes smras na/  tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byil pa so song skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis
139b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa
139b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzug
139b5(khri brgyad): zhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med kyi
139b6(khri brgyad): khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stob
139b7(khri brgyad): bcu dang / me'i jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su gtu
139b8(khri brgyad): ba ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de skad smras pa de de 'azhin te/ byis pa sa so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bag 'a med kyi
140a1(khri brgyad): / khongs su gtogs pa// nyanaHdang / rang sang margyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs pang rang bzhin gyibastong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
140a2(khri brgyad): pa med cing khongs su gtagapa pa ma len no// gzugs kyang rang bzhan las snang pa nyid kyi phye zag pas cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
140a3(khri brgyad): / zag pa med cing khongs su gtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
140a4(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kye bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cer khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// shu ri 'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod rjes pa 'di skad du sems
140a5(khri brgyad): dpa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med dpa/ tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes med
140a6(khri brgyad): ba rang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa yang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
140a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas
140a8(khri brgyad): 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs kyis mas ra 'dres pa rnams pa chags pa med dam/ rab 'byos gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang
140b1(khri brgyad): gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sang ba yang rnam par shes pa la rags pa med de// khams rnams dang / sdem chad rnams dang / rten da phral
140b2(khri brgyad): bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams dang / stabs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par reg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
140b3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems tan
140b4(khri brgyad): sa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub
140b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gnyes pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
140b6(khri brgyad): byams mi zhu gang pos 'did ces gsam to// bcom ldan 'das don gan shes byang chub sems da pa' mam ya dpa 'chen po nas pakyi ba la 'dan byas myoms lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal
140b7(khri brgyad): ga/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gang pos gsol ga bcom ldan 'das sems can de
140b8(khri brgyad): sems cad de ni theg pa chen po la la dug par gnas la lags te/ col ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po rnam pa gyin// rnanam tsha nga ldan pa shA 'i dus
141a1(khri brgyad): ma'i bu gad pal 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kon chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smra mchod
141a2(khri brgyad): lda pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems papa'i sems dpa' tshan pa ni nye che ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi mye dang/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pas yis/ sbyid pa'i rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sprin pa sbyid pa sa
141a3(khri brgyad): len gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ron du sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// nye tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
141a4(khri brgyad): khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi cad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims sung ngo // nye tshun sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gas
141a5(khri brgyad): bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi tshad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do// nyi mo'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
141a6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol
141a7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do// nyi tshe'i sems cad dam
141a8(khri brgyad): ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te// shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do// 
141b1(khri brgyad): bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig na yongs
141b2(khri brgyad): su mya ngan las bzla bar me bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag bas
141b3(khri brgyad): cha mi khyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzo/ 
141b4(khri brgyad): par bya'o// sems can 'bas dang gang yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sar bar bya'o// de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
141b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam
141b6(khri brgyad): so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis me yin gyi/ rnam pa
141b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
141b8(khri brgyad): su bsngo ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyed pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang / 
142a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la su ga/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste dung ldan pa'i sred la bya ba / shes sbyin pa sbyin ni/ 
142a2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyis pa yongs su mi bsngo bde ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ngas dpa' tsho ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sad pa/ sbyin basbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi
142a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan bang byang mar sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i bde la bya ba dag gis chos de dag pa bzad
142a4(khri brgyad): gang yin bden byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin par pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bug
142a5(khri brgyad): nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad ma gyun pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sa
142a6(khri brgyad): mas dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rob tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems pa
142a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sbyin pa spyad pa 'di lta ste/ rnalnga pa tham cad ma byed pa nyid dang lda pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyani thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
142a8(khri brgyad): rnams kyi sgrub sems byed pa gang san pa de'i byang chub se ma / mas dpa' chen po sbyid pa'i b.rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ smon pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
142b1(khri brgyad): tshe dang dran pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyid pa sbyin zhing / de gcig du yang migs pa'i kye ba chos thams cad la snrums byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar kan
142b2(khri brgyad): de sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs len 'apo yang 'i dmigs pa don byang chub semam dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shas
142b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gos pha rol
142b4(khri brgyad): pade dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pago cha chen po bgos pa
142b5(khri brgyad): par bya ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
142b6(khri brgyad): la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing de yang sems can thams cad dang zhun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
142b7(khri brgyad): po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
142b8(khri brgyad): pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la yang 'dod pa med na sos skye ba'i sal bu smos kyad bye dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
143a1(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA re'e bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad
143a2(khri brgyad): bakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa dade/ bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
143a3(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri ri bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

143a6(khri brgyad): yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med
143a7(khri brgyad): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dbang sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtad kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'o// 
143a8(khri brgyad): bshA rong du gzhan yang bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rgyal khrims ze rol tu phyin pa la spang ba rnam pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba dag gis chas thams cad las
143b1(khri brgyad): mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyi tshul khrims das rlob sems su yang me byed pa me dmig pa ya ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
143b2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni
143b3(khri brgyad): te sbyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu

143b5(khri brgyad): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po babod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la stod pa'i sbyin pa'i

143b8(khri brgyad): bakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad par dag par bslab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su srin par bya ba'i phyir yor te/ dge ba'i mang de yang sems

144a2(khri brgyad): ladzu pa shes sa sa na // hUM sman pazhi gan ba kyi pa ma sbyin na/ 1 sa
144a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bdag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams

144b1(khri brgyad): lang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad

144b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

144b7(khri brgyad): 'dini/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'asam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// me dang ldad pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang
144b8(khri brgyad): sem pa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhon pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
145a1(khri brgyad): yang la bya ba dag gis 'khong gsum yongs su dag par spyod pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang sems can thams cad dang nyung pong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
145a2(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
145a3(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / btsun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas ma gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan ya
