145a5(khri brgyad): dadang / mig yod dang / brag ma dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan zas dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin kyi/ 
145a6(khri brgyad): dmakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bdag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sem pa can thams cad dang bran mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
145a7(khri brgyad): babasngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
145a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
145b1(khri brgyad): bya ma gtan dmas la yang snyoms pa 'jugs/ bsam gtan rnams kyi grang bar yang mi byed teng / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang ma s+ya/ tshad med pa dang / gartsa
145b2(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la ro mang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag bri dbang gis kyang mi smra ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub
145b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
145b4(khri brgyad): ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang / 
145b5(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa
145b6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la
145b7(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i saras rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gage mo zhig ces bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
145b8(khri brgyad): bzhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du 'arjod pa chad budzad cing bsngags pa yang gsung ma med yang yongs su stsogs shi/ 
146a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' de'i sku rjo pa yang mdzad sa/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa yang mdzad do// shA Te thus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po cho tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'
146a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ glang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la
146a3(khri brgyad): nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa me dge ba'i chos rnams las dben
146a4(khri brgyad): ga pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes po'i dka' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang
146a5(khri brgyad): gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa
146a6(khri brgyad): med pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang
146a7(khri brgyad): dang / dka' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran bla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bskye
146a8(khri brgyad): sa 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / 
146b1(khri brgyad): shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med men skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam tan
146b2(khri brgyad): / rnams dang / tshad mod pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol// phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang
146b3(khri brgyad): rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang
146b4(khri brgyad): tsun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
146b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yang gong ma bzhin du sbar bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam
146b6(khri brgyad): / gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / chad med pa de dag dang / gzugs
146b7(khri brgyad): / med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags
146b8(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba dag gis sems can thams
147a1(khri brgyad): / cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsgo bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
147a2(khri brgyad): pa yid te/ de ga na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA re bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
147a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ 
147a4(khri brgyad): khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa yang de bzhin/ 
147a5(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems langs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad me dang mi gnyis pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ 
147a6(khri brgyad): bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
147a7(khri brgyad): 'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
147a8(khri brgyad): la ba'i phyir bas ma gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dad la yang rjod cang ton te rab tu 'char la/ rnab par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing / de dag gi ngo myang ba dang
147b1(khri brgyad): nyes dang / das par 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnang ba thams cad bakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dbya bde ga tu
147b2(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan ban pa'i bar dag gnon cing sgom ste/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la yang gnas la yi lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
147b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
147b4(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa la yang la bya ba dag gas gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phreng chos bstan to smras nas yid pa byed pa de dag pa 'dod pa dang / 
147b5(khri brgyad): bzod pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
147b6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad
147b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
147b8(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dgagis pas ma gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyis 'a
148a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyis payang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong dra byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni bya chu
148a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba dag gis bsas gtan
148a3(khri brgyad): po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / 
148a4(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'
148a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sa
148a6(khri brgyad): / dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po rnam pa thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
148a7(khri brgyad): pamed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
148a8(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan
148b1(khri brgyad): oM bu gzhan pang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam sa pa'i ting nge yidzin la rtsoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgrub po zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / hU~M
148b2(khri brgyad): 'dzinu la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar ngas par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams
148b3(khri brgyad): dgrol bar bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang snyams par 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gco
148b4(khri brgyad): dpa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / 
148b5(khri brgyad): dmed pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
148b6(khri brgyad): bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa naganog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi
148b7(khri brgyad): / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sa ram/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis po de dang
148b8(khri brgyad): par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing / 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
149a1(khri brgyad): sems da'a' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis me dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun su
149a2(khri brgyad): bad gA ba'i phyir brtson pa 'i gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa nabs la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
149a3(khri brgyad): po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
149a4(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gas kyang mi skyi la/ de dag gir kyang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa
149a5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad me
149a6(khri brgyad): gzuga' med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba yang byed la re yang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / nye ba'i rnam pa dang / 
149a7(khri brgyad): panyid sde rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems
149a8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// cho du ldan sa pA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 'as chen po chog pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chu'i sems dpa
149b1(khri brgyad): dnga' dzin pa nag du chen pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ldan na// tsha dang ldan pa shAr hA+e bu gzhan nga dbyung chub sems dpa' bems dpa' gyon pa'i mig 'a chen pa na mi migs pa'i tshul gyis nang sto
149b2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ 
149b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang
149b4(khri brgyad): la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
149b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces
149b6(khri brgyad): pami 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdagra med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / slong zhes bya ba dang / 
149b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / 
149b8(khri brgyad): ba'i tshul gyis ngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thug pa chen po la yang ngan par blugs pa bya
150a1(khri brgyad): cha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug
150a2(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba'i drus la shes pa yang mi 'jug la/ de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa'
150a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
150a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni dang pa'o khams su shes pa mi 'jug/ gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug pa/ de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
150a5(khri brgyad): khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
150a6(khri brgyad): na te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
150a7(khri brgyad): na po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma/ 
150a8(khri brgyad): byas kyi chos rnams la yang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'a khri chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas da/ 
150b1(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa yang ba yin pa ste/ tshod ldan pa sha ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de lta na
150b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yer ro// den sa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bum/ cha dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ga
150b3(khri brgyad): tsam gyis nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya// gang pos smras pa/ cha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
150b4(khri brgyad): / shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang yang dag par gnas la/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang
150b5(khri brgyad): dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
150b6(khri brgyad): byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
150b7(khri brgyad): kyikyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang
150b8(khri brgyad): spyan pa shA ra'i bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi daros tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sem/ 
151a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid gos ste/ de yang me dmigs pa'i tshum
151a2(khri brgyad): bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs kyi
151a3(khri brgyad): la gyis skom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
151a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i
151a5(khri brgyad): rgyal kyis skom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam pa drag zhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
151a6(khri brgyad): mo ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
151a7(khri brgyad): shi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgrom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang
151a8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi khams
151b1(khri brgyad): sumed pa'i byed/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad tsam du bdapar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de yang ming tsam du bad do// rnam pa
151b2(khri brgyad): shes pa'i bar du dasdigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dri lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni med tsam du zad do// mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lid
151b3(khri brgyad): mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste yi
151b4(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang de bzhin no// nang
151b5(khri brgyad): dadamigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni mi tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
151b6(khri brgyad): tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / 
151b7(khri brgyad): da dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas shes bya ba de
151b8(khri brgyad): ming tsam du zad de/ zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
152a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po mngon par shes ngan ra byed sem pa dang po bskyed banas bzung / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ge bar du
152a2(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing na su sangs rgyas ci nyid du 'gro'o// rgyas kyi zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang pa gang nges pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro b+ha bAdA
152a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed do// bla mar byed do// ri mor byed do// mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid
152a4(khri brgyad): chos nyan to// de theg pa chen po de la zhon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sang rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin
152a5(khri brgyad): dul/ de la sangs rgyas ci zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gying du shed thang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis pa med pa ras la gnas te/ lus ni lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed nus par
152a6(khri brgyad): 'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzan to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du na pa yang theg pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
152a7(khri brgyad): ma yang can thos dang/ ra / sa da na sa dri ba dang /  ma yis de/ rnams 'bring / mi ldas ci / lho' rgya chen po dang / mi bam ma
152a8(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// rab med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ shar phyogs kyi 'dzi
152b1(khri brgyad): gyi khamapa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chu
152b2(khri brgyad): dpa' 'ab spyad pa'i chen po 'di shes bya ba zhe ga pa chen po la zhen na sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid por ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtso nas kyang chos 'khor lo bskod tonas snyan pa sgrog pa
152b3(khri brgyad): dbyangs brjod par mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shag/ shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
152b4(khri brgyad): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khamamag ge mo zhes bya bzhi gan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bye ba zhig rnam
152b5(khri brgyad): pa myen pa nyid ba te/ rnam pa thams cing mkhyen pa nyid pa banas ca ma kyil na canam stan pa rdzogs shing dngas pa ba 'ang // skye dang pa shAng+gA'i zu / ran byang chub
152b6(khri brgyad): da sems chen bcig pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi sa kun pazib rgya ma las gyu sa \u0f7f/ bcugasas pa// 
152b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu pa// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go/ 
152b8(khri brgyad): bgos/ go ma chen po bgos shes brtson/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tsam gyis ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogo cha chen po bgos shes brtse ba lags/ bcom ldan
153a1(khri brgyad): bris bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' men zag pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gos
153a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rob tu phyin pa dang / bsod pa'i ba ra ga phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
153a3(khri brgyad): gocha bags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i / cha bgros/ yang dag pa'i spod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rke nga dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ na
153a4(khri brgyad): / pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go che bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag pa'i rig pa'i go cha bgos/ sangs
153a5(khri brgyad): / rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku go cha bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba
153a6(khri brgyad): par byed cing g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems cad dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu ni
153a7(khri brgyad): byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
153a8(khri brgyad): logs bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyang ba sgrog go// ngan pa sems can dmyabab po de dag gis sangs grub kyi skyed thos nas/ bde ba dang / yid bde bathob ste/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid kyis
153b1(khri brgyad): sems cad dam bsaganas byang dag/ gang dang gangan sangs rgyas bam ldan 'das rnams bzhugs/ mdza ning sanyes par byang yod pa dang / lha dang med skye bar 'gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
153b2(khri brgyad): dus pa dang / garnam nA /  ldan sa pas bzugs pa 'od der skye'o// de ban du shA dang / 
153b3(khri brgyad): sa dang / byed shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'ag dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi byem med dag snang bas khyab par byed cing / rnam pa dra
153b4(khri brgyad): bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rje gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas dang / sems cadang myal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tuzhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la
153b5(khri brgyad): bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing
153b6(khri brgyad): no// de na sa sems can dmyal ba bdadag gis sangs rgyas kyi sbed thos nas bde ba dang / yid bde bathob pa/ bde 'dang / yi dab ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang nas
153b7(khri brgyad): sa bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing / bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang / lha dang ming skye bar bgyung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// ming skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ded
153b8(khri brgyad): da do// de bzhin dud 'gro gyu gan rnams dang / gshi rje 'jig rten nams nas semam chen de dang pade ba 'o te/ gang dang gang na sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'ag
154a1(khri brgyad): de dang de skye'o// rang 'byur de gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gos chen po bags pa zhes bya'o// rab byor 'de skyed per na// smras mkhan nas/ spru
154a2(khri brgyad): mkhal pa zhig gis lam po che'i gzhi mdor skye bo bal pa che'i mdun du sems can dmyal kha dag dang / dud 'grong skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul la/ des mngon pa masprul na/ 
154a3(khri brgyad): sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgri pa sems can dmyal
154a4(khri brgyad): dad 'gyo'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas blang bar gyur na/ rab 'byor 'ding snyam du sems/ snyam mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / 
154a5(khri brgyad): skyoganas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas byung ba yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis la gso so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du bya
154a6(khri brgyad): pa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su bkrol yang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su 'akrol
154a7(khri brgyad): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor smra ma'i chos nyid nye bar 'arung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
154a8(khri brgyad): 'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gom chen po bgos ma myong ga su kyi sbyo chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams se phyir
154b1(khri brgyad): dumangon par sprul te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams be DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los bskur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul pa byed do// des 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod
154b2(khri brgyad): mngon par sprul nas/ ras 'dod pa rnams la bas sbyin par byed do// de bzhin du btung ba dang / gos dag / bsod padang / spos dang / ma tog phre dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / thug pa dang / bye ma dang / yo byad dang / 
154b3(khri brgyad): dang / mal cha dang / bka pa dang / 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang / rtsi sman dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dag dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba
154b4(khri brgyad): byed do// nges pas 'dod pa rnams la zas byen zhing yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston
154b5(khri brgyad): nade dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab
154b6(khri brgyad): di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i gzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/ bas 'ad
154b7(khri brgyad): rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yid rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang la yang ci yang phyi
154b8(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon
155a1(khri brgyad): sprul te/ bas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snyam 'chos
155a2(khri brgyad): / chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub se
155a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing 'khor los skur ba'i rigs su skye te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas na
155a4(khri brgyad): sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/ byang chub rje phyogs kyi
155a5(khri brgyad): chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
155a6(khri brgyad): don par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam/ 
155a7(khri brgyad): pa che' bani madrod skye bo la po che 'amadun du bye ba mtshogs chen po zhig mngon par stsa la nas dge ba 'du'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs kyim gyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dgal
155a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyum mkhan nam/ sam mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcom
155b1(khri brgyad): ci bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems da / 
155b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang
155b3(khri brgyad): cu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pabaco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyi

155b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god can/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar
155b7(khri brgyad): na po bgos te/ gal te sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang / khu tshur dang / lag cha ga/ mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' yang
155b8(khri brgyad): bskyed par mi bya'osnyam zhing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'god do// rab 'i par 'dis me dper na mam mkhanan sa/ snyam mkhan gyin 'am mkhas pa zhig gis
156a1(khri brgyad): rabazhim dar skyeb sa mdun du sbyang 'chags can pa zhag sa na par sprul nas bza rab tu phyin pa la sbyang mang ba// ngan/ rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems
156a2(khri brgyad): mkhan nam/ sku la mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag
156a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod

156a8(khri brgyad): la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams can lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
156b1(khri brgyad): 'dzud de 'go bar byed nga/  'byor 'angs ste/ dper na/ sbrum mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan kyi slob sa mkhas bzhag dasal rab che'i gzhi mdor sgrub pa la na cha'i mdun du/

156b7(khri brgyad): chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 
156b8(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
157a1(khri brgyad): gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzid du 'jug cing 'dzud de/ 'god ce na// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems pa
157a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng ba'am/ rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong ngo // rab
157a3(khri brgyad): nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan kyi ba rol tu yin
157a4(khri brgyad): ka par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// yang dag par 'dzin du drug pa de dag kyang blan mda' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sa ma
157a5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa dang 'phrul bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'od k+Sha ste bar na/ snum mkhan ga/ rnams khyen gyi slob momakhas pa mig gis lam na
157a6(khri brgyad): go la po che'i mdun du bye ba'i tshogs can po zhig mngon par sprul nas pasam garten gyi ba sa tu phyin pa yang dkri par 'dzin du bcug tsang bcud bkod pa/ rab 'byor 'ding snyam du
157a7(khri brgyad): rdzobs/ zlum pa pan mo// snyam bakhan gyi slob sa de sen can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi bar la tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dra du cug cing cu da de bkang baspyod sgyum 'am/ rab 'byos
157a8(khri brgyad): gas seMn ma ldan 'dzas dadi ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phrul pa/ raba'i byang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can
157b1(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'acug cing btsud de bkod kyang sems can 'ga' bar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i
157b2(khri brgyad): nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems papa' chen po po cha chen po bgo pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
157b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// 
157b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor
157b5(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang pa 'am/ tshurol
157b6(khri brgyad): parol mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi ba
157b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na ska ma mkhan nam/ sgyum mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i gzhi mdang skye bo bal po che'i
157b8(khri brgyad): bdun du skye mo'i tshogs chen pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de bkod na/ rab 'bya ba di'i blam du sems/ sum mkhan nas/ 
158a1(khri brgyad): / mamakhan kyi nob sades sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kya pa la tu phyin pal pa ga ga sod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nims chis lags sa/ 
158a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga'
158a3(khri brgyad): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyi den/ rab 'byor sa ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta
158a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni shar phyogs kyi
158a5(khri brgyad): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems
158a6(khri brgyad): can dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha ro tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
158a7(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rangab kyi pha rol tu bya
158a8(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed la/ 'di lta ste/ pha rosu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'i nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa
158b1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dran ma yang pha rol tu phyin pa drag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du b+h+yo dang / nub dang / byang dang / byung shar dang / shar
158b2(khri brgyad): lho dang / lho nu ba dang / mu khyad dang / 'ag dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re reng yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA klung ste byem snyed dag tu sa zhing / de ji ster bdag sbyin pa'i pa
158b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de la
158b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims sde pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi sa
158b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par badzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
158b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang mos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du na ma yang
158b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i gzhi mdor skye bo phal po
158b8(khri brgyad): mdun du kyi ba'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzid du bachug cing btsud de// bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di stsal du sems/ sgyum mkhan
159a1(khri brgyad): nama?/ nam mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag da' 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor kyi
159a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang
159a3(khri brgyad): sogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi phye ma snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu
159a4(khri brgyad): drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159a5(khri brgyad): chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas
159a6(khri brgyad): shing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems
159a7(khri brgyad): da cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
159a8(khri brgyad): la dgod par bya'o// 'di khyed cig na dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'ang skyed cag ni dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems
159b1(khri brgyad): na sangs rgyas pa chos ma 'das pa bcwa bzhad kyi par dag la dgad par bya'o// 'dra skad cig ma dgod par me bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rkun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par
159b2(khri brgyad): 'o// 'di snyed cig ni dkod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba' 'bras bu dang / phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom po nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di ste
159b3(khri brgyad): kani dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
159b4(khri brgyad): god par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ne dgod par mi bya'o snyam du ma sems kyi gzhan dun de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dayod
159b5(khri brgyad): 'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pa ni dang / sangs
159b6(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o// rgun du nuk+sha pI 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la
159b7(khri brgyad): dkod par bya'o// bdag gis sems can tshad med grang sa med pa dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// snyam du sems so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 
159b8(khri brgyad): mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i gzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye po'i chog pa chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis
160a1(khri brgyad): can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pa byed drug pa dgod par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa del dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad paradang / 
160a2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// rkyen du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// dgra bcom pa cad dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa pas
160a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma man nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
160a4(khri brgyad): la bkod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
160a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa tham
160a6(khri brgyad): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar la dgod par sems bskyed kyisems can 'gi'i don gyi phyir yang sems bskyed pa med do// de ci'i phyi bdun/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar ba
160a7(khri brgyad): chos rnams ci chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ 
160a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i ngad 'tshal bkar na/ chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skad du su mi'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ byang
160b1(khri brgyad): ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi ba lags pa snyam bgyed do// de ci'i skad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs
160b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / mig ni mig gis stong / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
160b3(khri brgyad): da ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos ni chos kyis stong / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong / 
160b4(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi la
160b5(khri brgyad): reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus
160b6(khri brgyad): dkyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reka/ pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sa spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i ma ros tu yin pas stong/ shes rab kyi pa ril phyin pa'i bar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
160b7(khri brgyad): ragyis stong / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sde bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
160b8(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso ba mad gyi bar ni sa chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyis stong la/ bcom ldan 'das bya
161a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong / go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni go cha ma mchis pa'i ko cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
161a3(khri brgyad): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byas/ ma ba shig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas la/ bya
161a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
161a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bkyis/ ma ba shig/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis shing // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po
161a6(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba'i sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis/ ma pa ga/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po me drimigs pas/ rnam pa
161a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ ma bshigapa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems
161a8(khri brgyad): ngas rgyasas bsheg/ mngon par 'dus mgyi bayin no// rdo ci byed nas/ rab 'byor de ltar gzugs nim byed/ mi 'dzi// ma na pa sa kyi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes pa
161b1(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par la mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mi byed/ me 'jig
161b2(khri brgyad): don par 'du mi byed/ gzugs ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams ni mi byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig kA rnam par shes pa
161b3(khri brgyad): don par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / li dang / lus dang / yid kyi dus te reg pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'dum byed/ mig ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni ma byed/ mi 'jig
161b4(khri brgyad): mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/ mi 'dzi// mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngo
161b5(khri brgyad): byed/ sems can dang / srog dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po 'bar ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 
161b6(khri brgyad): yo la ma ni mi b+hed/ mai 'ang// mngon dab kyi byed do// s+yA / za Sh+Ta dang / myig yo ng+yas kalpags pa nan dang / mig dang /  ban mi byed/ swI ngaM// mngon pa
161b7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mdod par 'du mi byeda'o// 
162a1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab sa dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid songs cad kyi bar ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ blang du par da mi byed do// de ci'i phreng zhen/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med ci med tshig
162a2(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sam cu rtsa bdun na ma byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 
162a3(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par dag pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ni mi byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// 
162a4(khri brgyad): 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'dumi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dgag tan ma
162a5(khri brgyad): migs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang
162a6(khri brgyad): ga pi'i mtha' ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de tso phung zhe na/ 'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'a
162a7(khri brgyad): byed do// thams cad shes pa nyid dang / num pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs
162a8(khri brgyad): te/ rab 'byor nas grangs des na/ khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/ ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
162b1(khri brgyad): dag gi don du gom chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang mabyas/ me ba shig/ mngon par 'phru ba bya ba'i yin par dag par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po poH
162b2(khri brgyad): chechen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba
162b3(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings mgol ba lags so// byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
162b4(khri brgyad): gu zugs nim bcings ma grol ba zhes sna/ 'am/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba dang / bdu shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings sa grol ba zhes smra'am/ rab 'byor rdzas smras pa/ 
162b5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma
162b6(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'o// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba gang ring
162b7(khri brgyad): 'byod kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rmi lam lta bu 'tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rmi lam lta
162b8(khri brgyad): par shes pa gang len pa de nis pa cings sa grol ba'o// de bzhi thags sna bu dang / spyas/ da/ smig sa bu dang / so gsong sa su dang / gzugs brtsonas dang/ sprul pa
163a1(khri brgyad): gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings mgro
163a2(khri brgyad): ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs nim bcings ma grol ba'i// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni
163a3(khri brgyad): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
163a4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma pa cings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma kri
163a5(khri brgyad): tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir she na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir/ gzugs de
163a6(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de 'din du gzugs dang / 
163a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir
163a8(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na
163b1(khri brgyad): ma tho ba med pa dang / kA rAt+na cas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig/ na pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ni ma bcid pa ma grol ba/ 
163b2(khri brgyad): shen/ gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir gzugs dam bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dge ba'am me dan/ 
163b3(khri brgyad): ba nas rnam par gang pa'i bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ rnam par shes pa nyid meng pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams
163b4(khri brgyad): cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa
163b5(khri brgyad): gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
163b6(khri brgyad): gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ meng po'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang / 
163b7(khri brgyad): ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po
163b8(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i
164a1(khri brgyad): bar dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa la sogs pa'i
164a2(khri brgyad): phyi ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma grol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma
164a3(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir mi bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa
164a4(khri brgyad): popode bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gan
164a5(khri brgyad): ba nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste med pa dang / dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma
164a6(khri brgyad): ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dka na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nim bcings ma grol ba'o// de ltar na rol tu phyin pa drug po dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa
164a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sems can yang dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla par 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang da
164a8(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'o// bsnye pa gung bya bar 'gar ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// thos par 'gyur
164b1(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nas yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'angam bcings ma grol ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mig lnga dang bra
164b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed par 'gyur ba yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
164b3(khri brgyad): nyid rtogs pas gyur pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur g.yangam bcings ma grol ba'o// theg pa gsum po dag gis sems can rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzla
164b4(khri brgyad): bayang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa dang / dben pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis
164b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyar stsong ba lasam bcings ma grol ba'i larba shes bya ste// bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
164b6(khri brgyad): nga ldan par ba 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lagasaHbcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis byang chub sems pa
164b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par thugs pa rig par bgyi/ theg pa de ni gang la yang dang ya shu bas pa lags/ theg pa de ni gang bu gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ theg pa nges ni
164b8(khri brgyad): nges par 'gyur bar 'gyur ba lags/ de ga ses gsom pa dang / bco ldan 'das kyis ma nga ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad nas bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad du/ bcom ldan
165a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags shes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems pa chen po 'theg pa
165a2(khri brgyad): yin te/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
165a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad ma
165a4(khri brgyad): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis 'di lta ste/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnabs sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas mi dmig
165a5(khri brgyad): tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gas
165a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sem
165a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems paskyed bdag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bdag kyang dge ba brda'i las kyilam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la/ sems can gan
165a8(khri brgyad): kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med
165b1(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
165b2(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis/ bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum chags pa dang ldan la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa yang dag
165b3(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu
165b4(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
165b5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la brtson pa mi 'dor zhing / gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ de yang mi
165b6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
165b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad
165b8(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis thabs la mkhas pas bdag kyang besam gtan la sgoms par 'jug car/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan nam
166a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jugs/ dayang me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bye nga de 'byer bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gtan pa rol tu phyin bayid do// 
166a2(khri brgyad): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa gang bags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems
166a3(khri brgyad): pa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad ma len pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bamed pa dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi
166a4(khri brgyad): la so sor rtog par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa de ni rab 'byor
166a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// shes rab kyi pa
166a6(khri brgyad): na pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / 
166a7(khri brgyad): ngab nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / ma
166a8(khri brgyad): dab pa song pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa snang ba nyid dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
166b1(khri brgyad): dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po meng bslong pa nyi dang // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin no// de la nang snang ba nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams
166b2(khri brgyad): ga dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de la zer zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ mig ni mig gis spong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin du
166b3(khri brgyad): dpa'i phyir/ rna ba rnabs stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// ther zug tu gnas pa med pa med pa dang / 2
166b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir/ sman sras stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de de yin pa'i phyir ro// zer zlog tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ lA ni lces spong ngo // de ci'i phyir
166b5(khri brgyad): rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// bar thug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ lus ni lus kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// zer zug tu ga
166b6(khri brgyad): ba ba dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ yid ni yid kyis spongango // de ci'i phyir shan/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te// de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// des phyi stong pa nyid ga zhe
166b7(khri brgyad): lidi// ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams so// ther chug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med 'i phyir/ gzug su ni/ zugs kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir na/ 
166b8(khri brgyad): 'anang yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ sgra dang / khri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos ni chos kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang
167a1(khri brgyad): / ran bye pa nyid ces bya'o// de la phyis stong she ga na/ dadag kyim da dag pa'i stem che drug po dang ni ga chos rnams
167a2(khri brgyad): dadage sa rnams kyi'i dus rnams kyis snying pa gang nas thang zlag nas pa myed gad/ 'dug pa me pa n-i nA gi m-igu / na bad / rna dang /  / lus / yi na
